definition: partner (in four person game)/family of proposed marriage partner
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: We expected to call their care of their families through such a campaign.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望用这样的项目唤起大家对家的感念。

sentences.english: The Dodger, as usual, was winning easily;
sentences.chinese: 和往常一样，神偷轻松地赢了对家。

definition: home-loving/to feel a strong attachment to home life/to begrudge being away from home
to be fondly attached to/to not wish to part with/to cling to
emotion/sentiment/affection/feelings between two persons/CL:個|个[ge4],種|种[zhong3]
affection/family love/love, esp. within a married couple or between parents and children
